invocation.name: Prayer to Elkyri I
invocation.description: A prayer to one specific Elkyri. Gives a bonus to one skill to perform one task of one fifth the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Unsarl's Hug I
invocation.description: Increases subject's strength by one twentieth of the invocation roll. Lasts until sleep.

invocation.name: Jarlak's Lope I
invocation.description: Increases subject's agility by one twentieth of the invocation roll. Lasts until sleep.
